casename: S3 Building Services Pte Ltd v Sky Technology Pte Ltd
coram: Chao Hick Tin JA; L P Thean JA
counsel: Manjit Singh and Sree Govind Menon (Manjit & Partners) for the appellant; Lok Vi Ming, Joanna Foong and Chan Hoe (Rodyk & Davidson) for the respondent
tags-parsed: Civil Procedure/Delay/Filing and exchange of affidavits of evidence-in-chief/Extension of time/Application by respondents to file and exchange affidavits of evidence-in-chief out of time dismissed by registrar but allowed by judge/Whether judge rightly held that delay was unjustified/Whether any prejudice caused to appellants by reason of respondents' delay

Civil Procedure/Striking out/Party causing delay in proceedings/Whether court should dismiss delaying party's action/Real risk of prejudice/Whether award of costs can compensate prejudice to innocent party/Striking out only as a last resort
